column4: hi there, does anyone know how i can get my perfect system to boot windows by default? i was a bit of a dab hand with old grub, but this new version's beyond me
i could do it no problem in dapper
Also, looks like there is an app called 'startupmanager'
wait, let me check if i've got universe enabled
the instructions on that page dont apply any more
anyone else know how i might change the boot order in grub2?
anyone know how i might set my perfect system to boot windows by default?
i could do it easily in grub legacy, but grub2 is beyond me
I just used the startupmanager app to do it. Granted, I'm not all that Linux savvy, but it worked on my Ubuntu 11.10.
sudo apt-get install startupmanager || sudo startupmanger
